content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in the city center, unfurnished, and measures 50 square meters. I think a fair price for this apartment would be 800 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is too low for such a prime location and size.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 900 euros per month? This includes all the necessary facilities and its proximity to the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is still too low for such a prime location and size.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. How about 950 euros per month? This includes all the necessary facilities and its proximity to the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is still too low for such a prime location and size.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 1000 euros per month? This includes all the necessary facilities and its proximity to the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is still too low for such a prime location and size.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Let's try 1050 euros per month. This includes all the necessary facilities and its proximity to the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is still too low for such a prime location and size.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 1100 euros per month? This includes all the necessary facilities and its proximity to the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1250 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your persistence, Emilia. I'm glad we could find an agreeable price of 1250 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
